alert.note: Alert for Guam (Guam) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Beach Hazards Statement issued October 02 at 10:18PM ChST until October 03 at 2:00AM ChST by NWS Guam
info.description: ...HIGH LIGHTNING RISK THROUGH 2 AM MONDAY... * WHAT...Frequent lightning along beaches. * WHERE...Primarily over southern Guam beaches, but could spread northward. * WHEN...Until 2 AM Monday. * IMPACTS...Dangerous conditions for beachgoers and fisherman. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A strong thunderstorm producing frequent lightning is currently along the east coast of southern Guam. Lightning strikes can cause serious injuries with life-long health issues, and can be fatal.
info.instruction: If thunder is heard or lightning is seen, go indoors and stay there until thunderstorms have dissipated. When no indoors location can be accessed, get inside a vehicle and avoid touching any metal parts. Remain out of the water to avoid hazardous swimming conditions. Fisherman should seek shelter until the storms pass.
